input.name: ctl73

div.p:
COVID-19 Update: All Lamar CISD schools and facilities will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
For all updates and remote learning information, please click here.

li.a: Bullying, School Safety and Crisis Resources

p.em: Para ver la informaciÃ³n de esta pÃ¡gina en espaÃ±ol, utilice el traductor de idiomas de Google en la esquina superior izquierda.

div.p: In response to the rapidly evolving COVID-19 situation in Fort Bend County, and to prevent community spread of the virus, Lamar CISD is extending the closure of all schools and facilities for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

During the suspension of normal school operations, Lamar CISD continues to support our families, staff and community. Continue to check the webpages below for updates, information and resources related to the COVID-19 coronavirus.

p.br: Staff, please use your District login and password to access the page

p.a: Class of 2020 Update: Prom and Graduation

br.a: Lamar CISD Extended Closure and Grading Policy
